project_short_description: A cool project that does cool things.

__prompts__.PYPI_TOKEN: What is your full scope PyPI token? (https://pypi.org/manage/account/token/)
__prompts__.author_name: What is the project author's name?
__prompts__.author_email: What is the project author's email?
__prompts__.author_username: What is the project author's username?
__prompts__.project_short_description: Describe the project in a short sentence.
__prompts__.project_visibility: What is the project visibility? (public or private)
__prompts__.copyright_year: What is the year for the copyright?
__prompts__.cli_required: Does the project require a CLI? (not implemented yet)
__prompts__.gui_required: Does the project require a GUI? (will only affect documentation)
